Row.Text: I only had iced tea, is not it?

Rainforest tiles provide +1 adjacency bonus for Campus, Commercial Hub, Holy Site, and Theater Square districts. +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture from [ICON_RESOURCE_TEA] Tea, [ICON_RESOURCE_SUGAR] Sugar and [ICON_RESOURCE_SPICES] Spices.
Additional Military policy slot. +3 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production to each city with encampment.

Levied units gain an ability giving them +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement and +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength. It cost 75% less [ICON_GOLD] Gold and resources to upgrade Levied units. If you Levy troops from a City-State receive 2 [ICON_ENVOY] Envoys with that City-State. Combat victories provide [ICON_Culture] Culture, [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Faith] Faith and [ICON_Gold] Gold equal to 10% of the [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength of the defeated unit.

All units receive +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when attacking wounded units. Mines and quarry receive +1 [ICON_SCIENCE] Science if there is an adjacent Campus district. Buildings that provide additional yields when [ICON_POWER] Powered receive +2 of that yield.
I will beat you if you move.

All units gains +7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when defending Ranged. Citizens may work Mountain tiles. Mountain tiles provide +2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith, +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food. +1 [ICON_FAITH] Faith to Mountain tiles for every adjacent Mine.

The soccer members who go home after the game.[NEWLINE]They are tired, and unfortunately run into a black-painted luxury car.[NEWLINE]To Miura who has all the responsibility to cover the juniors, [NEWLINE]What is the condition of the talk that the car owner, gang member Tanioka told?
Inquisitors can Remove Heresy one extra time.

Unlocks the Builder ability to construct a The Beast BB, unique to A Middsummer Lewd Dream.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture. +2 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture when unlock the Computers. +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold whe unlock the Social Media. Can be built on Adjecent Bonus or Luxury resources. Cannot be built on adjacent to another The Beast BB.
A Middsummer Lewd Dream unique improvement: The Beast BB

Koji Tadokoro unique Classical era melee unit. 3 [ICON_Movement] movement. this unit no need strategic resouces. this unit have unique primotion. +12 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength from Army units since the Industrial era.
Koji Tadokoro unique unit: Hakushin Karate Member
GO unique Classical era bombard unit that replaces the Catapult. Strongly beaten and generate ZOC.
TNOK unique Classical era light cavalry unit that replaces the Horseman. Stronger than Horseman. Double Flanking Bonus.
TNOK unique unit: Outlaw Black Horseman
TNOK unique Industrial era support unit. 5 [ICON_Movement] movement. Adjacent enemy units receive -5 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength.
The Violence Man unique Medival ranged unit that replace Crossbowman. Stronger than the Crossbowman.
The Violence Man unique unit: Kunikuzushi
Koji Tadokoro unique Modern era building that replaces the Shopping Mall. +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity. +100% [ICON_Tourism] Tourism from The Beast BB across your civilization.

GO unique Classical era building that replaces the Arena. +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture, +2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity. Gain [ICON_CULTURE] Culture equal to 25% of the unit's cost when a non civilian unit is created in this city.

The Violence Man unique Medival era building that replaces the Workshop. +2 [ICON_Science] Science, +2 [ICON_Production] Production. +1 [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer point, +1 [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist point.
The Violence Man unique building: Torture Workshop
TNOK unique District that replaces the Encampment. Provides +1 [ICON_Housing] Housing. +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from the other adjecent districts.
